Sentencas: This work focuses on the production of electricity using biogas as a renewable source of energy.
Titulo: Optimal Design of an Integrated Biogas-based Fuel Cell System

Sentencas: The proposed process system consists of two steps; the first step generates hydrogen from biogas via steam methane reforming (SMR), whereas the second step electrochemically converts this hydrogen into electricity using a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Optimal Design of an Integrated Biogas-based Fuel Cell System

Sentencas: These two steps are coupled via the material and energy integration.
Titulo: Optimal Design of an Integrated Biogas-based Fuel Cell System

Sentencas: Using a superstructure optimization approach, an optimal process is designed by selecting the best combination of processing alternatives for each of these steps.
Titulo: Optimal Design of an Integrated Biogas-based Fuel Cell System

Sentencas: Specifically, various processing options like anode and/or cathode gas recycling, biogas upgradation, external versus direct internal reforming, and incorporation of steam turbine and/or micro gas turbine are included in the design and systematically analyzed to achieve an optimal trade-off between power production, loss minimization, and utility consumption.
Titulo: Optimal Design of an Integrated Biogas-based Fuel Cell System

Sentencas: A two-step optimization approach is adopted to include material and energy integration.
Titulo: Optimal Design of an Integrated Biogas-based Fuel Cell System

Sentencas: For a power target of 300 kW, the proposed process gives a net electrical efficiency of 68% and offers an improvement of 7% over an existing biogas-based fuel cell system.
Titulo: Optimal Design of an Integrated Biogas-based Fuel Cell System

Sentencas: The obtained results are also validated against a rigorous process simulator.
Titulo: Optimal Design of an Integrated Biogas-based Fuel Cell System
